description:
The Business Strategy & Operations organization provides business critical insights using analytics, ensures cross functional alignment of goals and execution, and helps teams drive strategic partnerships and new initiatives forward. We stay focused on aligning the highest-level company priorities with effective day-to-day operations, and help evolve early stage ideas into future-growth initiatives.

The Revenue Acceleration team within Go-to-Market Operations (GtM) is a global team that aligns the company priorities with automation and analytics to deliver growth opportunities for our sellers and customers. We are responsible for the strategy, systems, and analytics that drive algorithmic lead generation (i.e., Recommended Opportunities) for our frontline teams.

In this role, you will be responsible for the operations of the Recommended Opportunities program, which include: designing and improving existing processes, managing cross-functional stakeholders, and creating communication materials for functional stakeholders, Sales teams, and executives. You will be working closely with Product, Engineering, and Sales teams globally to address sales feedback and identify continuous improvement needs. Additionally, you will demonstrate effective cross-functional program management skills, thoughtful vision, and teamwork across your team and your global stakeholders. Your ability to do so successfully will drive your impact on Google’s Ads business.

When our millions of advertisers and publishers are happy, so are we! Our Google Customer Solutions (GCS) team of entrepreneurial, enthusiastic and client-focused members are the "human face" of Google, helping entrepreneurs both individually and broadly build their online presence and grow their businesses. We are dedicated to growing the unique needs of advertising companies. Our teams of strategists, analysts, advisers and support specialists collaborate closely to spot and analyze customer needs and trends. In collaboration, we create and implement business plans broadly for all types of businesses.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Operations, Business Administration, or equivalent practical experience.
  • 3 years of experience in consulting or cross-functional program management.
  • Experience with SQL and/or similar analytical tools.
  • Experience in tools and elements of project management.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience working with technical teams
  • Experience with online advertising products/business
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with high attention to details
  • Excellent written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills.
responsibilities:
• Manage quarterly sales planning process and new initiatives for the Recommended Opportunities program.
  • Drive scalable local priorities through the Recommended Opportunities program.
  • Convert stakeholder feedback into actionable product and program improvements.
  • Coordinate and communicate with stakeholders/partners across Product, Engineering, and Sales teams globally.
title: Program Manager, Global Revenue Acceleration
